00029 #ifndef _Hydrax_Noise_Perlin_H_

00034 #include "../Noise.h"
00035 
00036 #define n_bits                          5
00037 #define n_size                          (1<<(n_bits-1))
00038 #define n_size_m1                       (n_size - 1)
00039 #define n_size_sq                       (n_size*n_size)
00040 #define n_size_sq_m1            (n_size_sq - 1)
00041 
00042 #define n_packsize                      4
00043 
00044 #define np_bits                         (n_bits+n_packsize-1)
00045 #define np_size                         (1<<(np_bits-1))
00046 #define np_size_m1                      (np_size-1)
00047 #define np_size_sq                      (np_size*np_size)
00048 #define np_size_sq_m1           (np_size_sq-1)
00049 
00050 #define n_dec_bits                      12
00051 #define n_dec_magn                      4096
00052 #define n_dec_magn_m1           4095
00053 
00054 #define max_octaves                     32
00055 
00056 #define noise_frames            256
00057 #define noise_frames_m1         (noise_frames-1)
00058 
00059 #define noise_decimalbits       15
00060 #define noise_magnitude         (1<<(noise_decimalbits-1))
00061 
00062 #define scale_decimalbits       15
00063 #define scale_magnitude         (1<<(scale_decimalbits-1))
00064
